reviewText: The movie is set around the Christmas season and deals with people who are in search for love and with a little help of divine intervention they find it!

Finally, I'm able to understand the other half of the movie!!  I was very excited that Amazon has this DVD because I couldn't find this movie with English subs at any other trusted online source.  Very grateful!  Thanks Amazon!

It is a wonderful journey of joy and laughter. It breaks the stereotypical view of human disability.  Bring hope to the heart, faith in human to change, and invites us to live in other's life. Share in the human experience of others without judgment.
